EmailTemplate.description: Medical Policy using Kevlar® and Nomex®
EmailTemplate.name: DPS- Medical Policy
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Medical Policy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar® and Nomex®. Please review our medical policy. Should you have any questions, please call the contact in the letter.
DuPont Protection Solutions
